ISSUE.TITLE: Editor group can't attach files while creating a new row
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: v10.19.0 Arch: x64 Platform: linux Docker: false Database: mysql2 ProjectOnRootDB: false RootDB: sqlite3 PackageVersion: 1.0.0 **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Login as an editor use 2. Try to attach a file 3. See "not allowed" **Expected behavior** A not allowed error
